usercssData.name: Dark-WhatsApp
usercssData.description: Dark and light, very customizable theme for WhatsApp.
usercssData.author: vednoc <vednoc@pm.me> (https://github.com/vednoc)

fb_compact.label: Collapse messages when `fb-like` tail style and `RTL` tweaks are enabled
fb_compact.name: fb_compact

emoji_b.label: Decrease height of big emojis when `fb-like` tail style and `RTL` tweaks are acctive
emoji_b.name: emoji_b

bubble_in.label: Swap sides for incoming message bubbles
bubble_in.name: bubble_in

bubble_out.label: Swap sides for outgoing message bubbles
bubble_out.name: bubble_out

rtl_format.label: RTL: Fix formatting for message content
rtl_format.name: rtl_format

c_g_c.label: Theme colors for replies and group members
c_g_c.name: c_g_c

description: Dark and light, very customizable theme for WhatsApp.
name: Dark-WhatsApp
